translations.You were mentioned on “{file}”, in a com: T'ant mentovadu in “{file}”, in unu cummentu de un'utente chi ant cantzelladu
translations.{user} mentioned you in a comment on “{f: {user} t'at mentovadu in unu cummentu in “{file}”
translations.Files app plugin to add comments to file: Estensione de s'aplicatzione archìvios pro agiùnghere cummentos a archìvios
translations.No comments yet, start the conversation!: Ancora perunu cummentu, cumintza sa cunversatzione!
translations.Unable to load the comments list: Non faghet a carrigare sa lista de cummentos
translations.An error occurred while trying to edit t: Ddoe at àpidu un'errore proende a modificare su cummentu
translations.An error occurred while trying to delete: B'at àpidu un'errore proende a cantzellare su cummentu
translations.An error occurred while trying to create: B'at àpidu un'errore proende a creare su cummentu
translations.Error occurred while retrieving comment: B'at àpidu un'errore in su recùperu de su cummentu cun ID {id}
translations.Error occurred while updating comment wi: B'at àpidu un'errore in s'agiornamentu de su cummentu cun id {id}
translations.Error occurred while posting comment: B'at àpidu un'errore in sa publicatzione de su cummentu
